{{cpp/thread/unique_lock/title|swap}}
{{cpp/thread/unique_lock/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|
void swap( unique_lock&amp; other ) noexcept;
}}

交换锁对象的内部状态。

===参数===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|要交换状态的锁}}
{{par end}}

===返回值===
（无）

===示例===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;mutex&gt;

int main()
{
    std::mutex mtx1;
    std::unique_lock&lt;std::mutex&gt; guard1(mtx1);
    std::unique_lock&lt;std::mutex&gt; guard2;
    guard2.swap(guard1);
    
    if (!guard1 &amp;&amp; guard2)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "交换成功\n";
    
    return 0;
}
|output=
交换成功
}}
